samples.context: Surgical methods can be used to create such blocks. While surgical methods are safe in the long run, surgery itself can cause infections and other problems if not performed properly.
samples.question: What problems can arise from surgical contraception?

samples.context: If the vas deferens in the male is blocked, sperm transfer will be prevented. If the fallopian tube in the female is blocked, the egg will not be able to reach the uterus.
samples.question: What happens when the fallopian tube is blocked?

samples.context: The size of the human population is a cause for concern for many people. This is because an expanding population makes it harder to improve everybodyâ€™s standard of living.

samples.context: However, if inequality in society is the main reason for poor standards of living for many people, the size of the population is relatively unimportant.
